Requirements.Requirement: Complete all the following required Statistics courses
Complete 1 of the following Communications courses
Complete 1 of the following Calculus 3 courses
Complete 1 of the following Advanced Math/CS courses
Complete 1 additional STAT course at the 300- or 400-level
Complete 1 additional STAT course at the 400-level OR an Advanced CS Course
Complete 4 additional 300/400-level courses from ACTSC, AMATH, CO, CS, MATBUS, MATH, PMATH, STAT
Requirements.Courses: ACTSC, AMATH, CO, CS, MATBUS, MATH, PMATH, STAT (300 or 400 level)

Requirements.Requirement: Complete 3 additional courses from ACTSC, AMATH, CO, CS, MATBUS, MATH, PMATH, STAT
Requirements.Courses: ACTSC, AMATH, CO, CS, MATBUS, MATH, PMATH, STAT (any level)
